title: 12/21/21 DPS Hour 3 Steve Young
itunes:title: 12/21/21 DPS Hour 3 Steve Young
description:
Steve Young talks to Dan about the games in the NFL and how there is a bias against left handed QB's. Steve says that being left handed almost made him play defensive back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
